Text:
Thanks for the upload!

This is supposedly an edited TV-14 version of the episode... I'll probably just wait, though.
is this real it doesnt air til july 1st?
Dude You Rock! I don't care if it is edited! Who Else Has It??! Dam Right, NO ONE! Let the nay-sayers & trolls talk sh*t, I am enjoying weeds tonite! Thanks again! and yes Virginia, It is REAL 0_o

Yea, it's censored.

As much as i like to watch things before everyone else, i'll just wait till the official episode is out.

Thanks though!

For anyone who is hesitant about watching an "edited" version of the episode: it looks to be only edited to give it a lower classification. It runs for 26 minutes, so I don't think any scenes were cut. All that seems different is they censor the swear words, and put a black box over one tiny sex scene (in the recap) and one brief raised middle finger.

Totally worth the early download!
And thanks heaps DibyaTPB for your awesomeness.

@NaNaMoose Yes others have it. Just because the link wasn't sent to you does not mean it just doesn't exist. Smart-ass internet commenters are at the bottom of the food chain. And theres a damn good reason for that. Enjoy.
